title: Pagetype explanationPic content
description: Description of the content of the Pagetype 'explanationPic'

text.description: The text shown on the Page. OR write _objectname.propertyname_ to access an objects property, like a text

img.description: Filename of the image. Has to have the file ending included. Possible endings are 'mp4', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif'. OR write _objectname.propertyname_ to access an objects property, like a filepath

imagePosition.description: Sets the position of the image on the Page. OR write _objectname.propertyname_ to access an objects property, like a position

continueDelay.description: The amount of seconds after which the Continue Button is shown. -1 for never(wait for Hardware). OR write _objectname.propertyname_ to access an objects property, like a number. Can also be accessed by hardware, via the 'showContinueButton' event
